document_data.mainbody:
anessa was a human templar stationed at Camp Vengeance in the late 15 century DR.
She had slightly tanned skin with freckles, and brownish red hair. Her eyes were green.
Vanessa had a relationship with the tabaxi bard Birdsong. They had to meet in secrecy, as Vanessas commanders would not allow such trysts by soldiers posted in the camp. During a Grand Revel in the late 15 century DR, Vanessa asked a group of adventurers to find out what had happened to her lover. The adventurers found that Birdsong had been captured by Nanny Pupu in Mbala, and managed to free the tabaxi.
